name: NovaX
description:
Nova-X is a solo/cooperative Survival game in development.

Dive into a multiplayer pirate/fantasy world where you can embark on world exploration, conquer territories, build ships, seek treasures, or gleefully indulge in pillaging.

Dominate a world you don't know, build your own bases, and survive against rival player tribes.

Nova X is a survival game that offers unique gameplay with various features such as farming, building, quests, navigation, ...

Important: The game is in development. Don't buy the game if you expect a full game or a lot of elements. The game will grow over time and if you want to helping out in this process, you can communicate with the dev at any time.
